actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-762.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to convey property to the Committee for a National Museum of the Building Arts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to convey a Federal office building in the District of Columbia to the Committee for a National Museum of the Building Arts, Incorporated. Specifies terms to be included in the deed of conveyance, including a provision that the property be preserved in its historically authentic architectural character. Repeals Federal law providing for a cooperative agreement between the Administrator, the Committee, and the Secretary of the Interior for the operation of such a museum.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to convey property to the Committee for a National Museum of the Building Arts, and for other purposes.
